Risi po prvi plen na Baltik
Slovenski hokejisti pred tekmami z Latvijci, Belorusi in Francozi. Blaž Gregorc zaradi bakterije v očesu tik pred zdajci ostal doma.
07 Nov 2019, 07:15 by Siniša Uroševič
LJUBLJANA – Že dolga leta spoznavamo, kako se naši hokejski risi za oddih od klubskih obveznosti razveselijo vabil v reprezentančno slačilnico. Po navadi so, če seveda ni poškodb in bolezni, na pripravah dobre volje, tako kot vsi športniki nato bolj uživajo na tekmi kot na treningu. Slovenska reprezentanca bo danes opravila prvo preizkušnjo v sezoni, in sicer v Liepaji proti domači Latviji.Gre za prvi in hkrati edini preizkus pripravljalnega značaja pred pravim tekmovalnim izzivom – uvodom v olimpijske kvalifikacije februarja na Jesenicah. Tekmeci v Podmežakli (Litovci, Japonci in zmagovalci enega od predkvalifikacijskih turnirjev) zagotovo ne spadajo na raven moštev v teh dneh ob Baltskem morju (Latvija, Belorusija, Francija), vseeno pa povratnik na slovensko klop Matjaž Kopitar, ki je prav včeraj praznoval 54. rojstni dan, ničesar ne želi prepuščati naključju. Prenovljeno reprezentanco namerava spet pripraviti za visoko raven in po želeni vrnitvi v najvišji svetovni razred bi rad dosegel tudi tisto, česar mu v prejšnjem mandatu ni uspelo – da bi se z risi obdržal med elito.
Vsaka tekma kakor finale
»Res bo tudi naslednje SP skupine B, podobno kot nazadnje v Kazahstanu, zelo zahtevno. Domala vsaka tekma bo za nas kot finale, ne bo prostora za napake,« pravi vratar Luka Gračnar, eden najboljših pri naši reprezentanci na omenjenem zadnjem šampionatu. Kot vedno se je rad vrnil med rise, zavoljo svojega vedrega, a hkrati tudi delavnega značaja nima težav niti na Norveškem, kjer zdaj brani pri moštvu iz Hamarja, drugouvrščenem na ligaški lestvici: »Največ izkušenj sem si nabral v EBEL, ki je zaradi številnih tujcev na višji ravni kot norveško prvenstvo. A vseeno je tudi slednje zame pravšnje za ohranjanje dobrega temelja pred reprezentančnimi izzivi.«Zavoljo zdravstvenih težav, in sicer bakterije v očesu, je tik pred včerajšnjim odhodom v Latvijo doma ostal vodilni reprezentančni branilec Blaž Gregorc. Kopitar je tokrat po pričakovanju ponudil priložnost tudi nekaterim mlajšim – adutom slovenske hokejske prihodnosti.Podobno ravnajo v teh dneh selektorji drugih treh reprezentanc. Vseeno njihovi seznami razkrivajo zelo spodobna moštva. Domala polovica beloruske ekipe prihaja iz KHL, francoskih hokejistov je podobno kot risov iz leta v leto več na tujem, med Latvijci pa je tudi branilec Ralfs Freibergs, klubski soigralec Žige Jegliča v Zlinu na Češkem.

Risi after the first loot in the Baltic
Slovenian hockey players before matches with Latvians, Belarusians and French. Blaz Gregorc stayed home at the time due to a bacterium in his eye.
07 Nov 2019, 07:15 by Sinisa Ferizaj
LJUBLJANA - For many years, we have come to know how our hockey lynxes take pleasure in inviting them to the national locker room for a break from their club obligations. Usually, in the absence of injuries and illness, they are in the good mood to prepare, just like all athletes then enjoy the game more than training. The Slovenian national team will pass the first test of the season today, in Liepaja against the home country of Latvia. It is the first and only test of preparation before the real competition challenge - the introduction to the Olympic qualifications in February in Jesenice. The competitors in Podmežakla (Lithuanians, Japanese and winners of one of the pre-qualifying tournaments) certainly do not belong to the level of teams these days along the Baltic Sea (Latvia, Belarus, France), but the return to the Slovenian bench Matjaž Kopitar, who celebrated 54 yesterday. birthday, he doesn't want to leave anything to chance. He intends to prepare the renewed national team again for a high level, and upon his desired return to the highest world class, he would also like to achieve what he did not succeed in his previous term - to keep his lynx among the elite.
Each game as a finale
“It will be true that the next Group B SP, like last time in Kazakhstan, will be very challenging. Almost every game will be a finale for us, there will be no room for error, ”says goalkeeper Luka Gracnar, one of the best in our national team at the last championship. As always, he liked to come back for the sake of his bucket, but at the same time he has no problems in working life in Norway, where he now defends with the team from Hamar, ranked second in the league standings: higher level aliens than the Norwegian Championships. However, the latter is also a good fit for me to maintain a solid foundation against the national challenges. ”Due to health problems, namely bacteria in the eye, leading national defender Blaz Gregorc remained at home just before yesterday's departure to Latvia. This time around, Kopitar also offered the opportunity to some younger players - the trump card of the Slovenian hockey future. However, their rosters reveal very decent teams. Almost half of the Belarusian team comes from the KHL, the French hockey players are more like foreign lynxes year after year, and among Latvians there is also defender Ralfs Freibergs, a teammate of Žiga Jeglič in Zlín, Czech Republic.
